text: Allard Jan van der Scheer (21 August 1928 - 10 January 2014) was a Dutch actor. He was known for his roles in Daar gaat de bruid (1986), Hotel de Botel (1976) and Die Vrouwtjes van de wereld (1963). He was also an actor of television and stage. Allard van der Scheer was born on 21 August 1928 in The Hague, Netherlands. His daughter was also an actress. Scheer died on 9 January 2014 in Muiderberg, North Holland. He died from lung cancer.
